meanings.definition: (Latin) to drive together, collect; to force, compel
meanings.english_definition: (Latin) to drive together, collect; to force, compel

examples.translation: To compel someone to do something.
examples.english_translation: To compel someone to do something.

usage_notes.usage: Used in both literal and figurative senses.
usage_notes.example: Can indicate physical force or moral obligation.
